comment: the whole class is 7 discussion posts which are VERY long and tedious.7 quizzes, you get two attempts each. two papers, and a final exam. professor was pretty much absent but its an online class so what do you expect. I wouldn't take the class again solely because it felt like busy work.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lots of homework

comment: No books required. Participation in class is a must. Graded by a few things. At the end of our class, she is no longer teaching this class.

Dr. Lyons is fantastic! Her class was more discussion-based, and I feel like I learned more because of that. The information was highly applicable and inspiring. She really cares about each of her students and wants you to succeed. The papers and projects weren't difficult, as long as you put forth some effort. I really enjoyed this class!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational

comment: Dr. Lyons is such a genuine person. She truly cares about her students and wants them succeed. She offers extra credit, and her class is easy.

Shes a real teacher meaning shell tell it like it is, but also, she cares so much for her students. She really gives you everything you need to pass. Her class is never boring, and I actually enjoyed going to her class. Shes one of my favorite professors ever !
She's one of the most caring and understanding professors at the university. She's openminded and if you just put in a little effort, you'll do just fine.

Amazing teacher as one of my first semester professors. Came in very nervous, but Dr Lyons is so nice and inspirational. She teaches things that need to be taught while incorporating life long lessons as well. Is passionate, understanding, and a great teacher. Take if you can!

Dr. Lyons was amazing, she gives you tons of opportunity for extra credit (even tho you don't really need it) and is very flexible when it comes to attendance. She is a very inspiring person, I really enjoyed every second of her class.
Realist professor at KSU my opinion! Very helpful.
There's a lot of useful information if you are self motivated and serious about your education and getting the most of your college experience. She's open to mentoring and she is fabulous!
